p: Healthy root parts were collected from F. ovina grown in Zoshk mountains of Khorasan Razavi province, Iran (36°26′12.0″N 59°11′51.6″E) ( Figure 1). Voucher specimens (No. 13274) were identified by Prof. Emami and Ms. Souzani (Department of Pharmacognosy, School of Pharmacy, Mashhad University of Medical Sciences) and were deposited at the Herbarium of the Mashhad University of Medical Sciences, School of Pharmacy, Mashhad, Iran.
